content:
RPU may refer to:

Raid Processing Unit, chip used for RAID calculations
Ray Processing Unit, for ray tracing
Radio Processing Unit (Baseband processor), for digital radio connectivity
Rigid Polyurethane, a type of plastic
Right of Perpetual Usufruct, public ground lease in Poland
Remote pickup unit, a kind of radio system
Reprocessed uranium: RpU
Revenue per unit
Road Policing Unit, Traffic Police
Remote Power Unit, a type of LED light using solar, wind, and storage generated electricity
Refrigerant Pumping Unit
